comments.text:
I really enjoy dog footage on Youtube. They continually make me laugh. 
HOWEVER a great deal of regular people are incrementally KILLING their 
family dogs - without realizing it! The stuff that they put into pet food 
generates varieties of cancer and makes most dogs die young. I figured that 
out the tough way when my pet dog passed away aged 5. To save your animal's 
life lookup the Double Life Dog Diet (Google it.) It's what I have done.

comments.author: KellyOKellyComedy

comments.text:
The flash is rarely ever sparked by great love; usually the great love 
grows from it if it's the right. Not to downplay any past hurt, but try to 
see it an 'interview' for the rest of your life & watch for early signs 
good & bad so you don't get too deep if it's not right. Remember that all 
relationships we form familial, platonic & romantic, contribute to the full 
person we become so good or bad we build & learn from them, thus becoming 
our whole self. And, never dive in without thinking!

again to find someone I can dive into without think(ing) at all.
